body:
Aiiii, I remember seeing a few screenshot of this and wondering where it was from!

 Nice to see it hot uploaded, Lisia totally doesn't get enough attention... 

Now I suppose I'll have to wait to see if it gets a translation... Still, this is definately good enough for now lol
Well sir, that was a dangerous move
I've waited so long for this to be uploaded I almost bought a $100 copy to do it myself.
